description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

Creative Writing: imagine a scenario
Elevator
Taking the elevator is a convenient way to travel between the floors. How many people are taking the elevator? Where are they going? What do they intend to do?
This week's topic: The elevator arrived... (90-110 words)

范例1：

16... 15... 14... Wolfe was staring at the display inside the elevator as the number decreased. Usually when going downstairs, he preferred the stairs, but with his arm still in bandages, he chose the elevator. Wolfe's mind wandered during this idle time alone. Who took my memory card? The only logical conclusion he reached was that his mysterious rescuer took it. Who was he? Wolfe's chain of thought was cut off. Ting! The elevator arrived at the selected floor, and the doors opened slowly. A noisy and chaotic scene greeted him.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

description:

歌曲介绍：

《Let Her Go》是英国民谣创作歌手Passenger（Mike Rosenberg）首张个人专辑《All The Little Lights》的第二支单曲，发行于2012年7月。从2012年底，该单曲接连在欧洲，大洋洲大获成功，随后又开始风靡北美

模唱片段：

Well you only need the light when it's burning low
Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
Only know you love her when you let her go
Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
Only hate the road when you’re missin' home
Only know you love her when you let her go
And you let her go

description:
I'd also recommend the rather tender investigation by another musician Gruff Rhys into a Welsh pioneer's 17th century journey into the "American Interior" on the trail of a Welsh legend. Both of those films feature extraordinary characters who might not be out of place in an animation by the influential Japanese director Hayao Miyazaki, who co-founded his Studio Ghibli and whose best-known works include the 2003 Oscar-winning "Spirited Away" as well as "My Neighbor Totoro" and "Howl's Moving Castle". Miyazaki's now 73 and he's indicated that the film out this week "The Wind Rises" will be his last. It's clearly very personal and is based on the life of a real aircraft engineer fascinated like Miyazaki himself by flying and the element wind that makes it possible. To put this valedictory work in the context of Miyazaki's career, we spoke to Andrew Osmond, author of the BFI monograph on "Spirited Away", to Nick Bradshaw editor of Sight & Sound online and critic Lurishika Evanzede.

He's so huge in Japan. I mean, he's always called the Walter Disney of Japan and I would say that to people who haven't heard of him, just, just give a sense of how big he is over there. "Spirited Away", his 2000 film is the biggest grossing film in Japan of all time. I mean the top five grossing films of Japan, three of them are his films. He's absolutely huge.

He was very determined to work on higher quality productions partly by his determinations, partly by luck. He was able to be involved in his own studio, Studio Ghibli.

Part of the point of founding Studio Ghibli was to build a position of independence. He's found there's amazing balance in active being able to make blockbuster films and make them as beautiful and detailed and personal as possible.

description:
Tottenham are looking for a new manager having sacked Tim Sherwood. He replaced André Villas Boas in December, but that 18-month deal contained a break clause which the chairman Daniel Levy has decided to exercise after the team finished sixth in this season's Premier League. Tottenham's goalkeeper Brad Friedel said Sherwood should be proud of what he achieved in a short space of time.

"I thought Tim, especially in his first managerial job, conducted himself very well. I mean he's a man who wears his heart on the sleeve. I think everyone could see that. He was asked to take control on an interim basis with players that weren't necessarily his and then he got the job for 18 months and I think his win percentage speaks for a lot, and I think he did really well."

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

Creative Writing: imagine a scenario
Surveillance. What was the surveillance for? Where was it installed? Who monitored it? What event was captured?
This week's topic: The surveillance revealed that... (90-110 words)

范例1：

He slammed the folder on the desk and stared at his subordinate. "It took almost one week to get this?" he said in a chilly voice. The subordinate did not dare to answer, but kept his head down and bowed slightly. "Make yourself useful," he ordered. The subordinate bowed deeply, and picked up the few pages which had fallen onto the floor. Putting the few blurry surveillance pictures of the masked figure from the night of the incident back into the folder with the medical report of the victim, he left quietly.

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于经济影响文学的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

SUMMARY：

罗宾·威廉姆斯去世了，年仅63岁。现场表明是明显的自杀。一时间，各种反应，无数悼念涌入······
 
CONTENT：
“Robin Williams passed away this morning. He has been battling severe depression of late,” Buxbaum said in a statement. “This is a tragic and sudden loss. The family respectfully asks for their privacy as they grieve during this very difficult time.”
Williams’ wife, Susan Schneider, also released a statement to news outlets: “This morning, I lost my husband and my best friend, while the world lost one of its most beloved artists and beautiful human beings. I am utterly heartbroken. On behalf of Robin’s family, we are asking for privacy during our time of profound grief. As he is remembered, it is our hope the focus will not be on Robin’s death, but on the countless moments of joy and laughter he gave to millions.”
 

【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！
轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

“罗宾·威廉姆斯今天上午去世了。他近来一直与严重的抑郁症作斗争。”巴克斯鲍姆在一份声明中说道，“这是一个悲剧，也是一大损失。在这段非常艰难的时期，他的家人沉浸在悲痛中，请大家尊重他们的隐私。”
威廉姆斯的妻子苏珊·施耐德也向各媒体机构发表了一份声明：“今天上午，我失去了我的丈夫和我最好的朋友，而这世界也失去了一位最心爱的艺术家和最好的人。我彻底心碎了。我代表罗宾的家人，请求大家，在我们最悲伤的时候，给我们一点隐私，。我们希望，大家在缅怀罗宾的时候，不要关注他的死亡，而是关注他曾经给亿万观众带来的无数欢乐和笑声。”

参考译文2：

巴克斯鲍姆在陈述中说道：“今天上午，罗宾•威廉姆斯（喜剧巨星）去世了。（他去世前，）一直在与严重的老年抑郁症对抗。他的去世是一个既令人悲痛又很突然的损失。他的家人请求不被媒体打扰，因为他们在这个艰难的时刻都很悲伤。”
威廉姆斯的妻子苏珊•施奈德也向新闻媒体发布了一条声明：“今天上午，我失去了我的丈夫和最好的朋友，然而这个世界失去了一个最受人喜爱的艺术家和最美丽的人。我十分悲痛。我代表罗宾的家人，请求新闻媒体在我们沉痛的哀悼期间不来打扰我们。我们希望他能被人们所铭记，不是因为他的死，而是因为他带给人们无数的欢乐时刻。”

参考译文3：

Muxbaum发表申明，“罗宾•威廉姆斯在今天早上离逝。他近来一直饱受抑郁的折磨。我们对他的突然离去感到非常伤心。”他的家人希望外界给予他们一点隐私，因为他们正经历一个非常困难的时期。威廉姆斯的妻子苏珊•施耐德也通过一家媒体发表一份申明：“今天早上，在世界失去一位受人喜爱的艺术家、最美丽的一个人的同时，我失去了我的丈夫、我的朋友。我伤心至极。现在，我以罗宾家庭的名义，希望在这悲伤的时期内给予我们的一些隐私。因为他为大家所熟知，所以我们希望大家不要把焦点放在他的死上，而是记住他给予数百万观众带来的美好、欢乐时光。”

参考译文4：

“罗宾威廉姆斯长期受到重度忧郁症困扰，已于今晨过世。”布克斯包姆在一份申明中表示，“他的突然离开是个巨大的损失。他的家人希望外界能给予他们足够的隐私度过这段非常时期。”
威廉姆斯的妻子，苏珊斯内德也同时对外发表申明：“今天早上，我失去了我的丈夫，也是我最好的朋友，同时，这个世界也失去了一个深受爱戴的艺术家，一个伟大的人。我现在非常痛心。我代表罗宾的家人，希望在这样一段悲痛的时期，大家能够尊重我们的隐私。也希望大家能够把关注放在威廉姆斯曾经带来的无数欢乐和笑声，而不是他的离去上。”

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：如果柏林不快乐

20秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

NATO leaders have also been discussing how the alliance should respond to the threat posed by the militant group Islamic State in Iraq and Syria. The British Prime Minister David Cameron has said he will urge members of the alliance to stop paying ransoms to the militants to secure the release of hostages. France and Italy are believed to have paid extremist groups to secure the release of hostages.北大西洋公约组织（以下简称NATO）的领军人物也仍在讨论北约要如何应对伊拉克及叙利亚地区的军事组织“伊斯兰国”所造成的威胁。英国首相大卫·卡梅隆已经表示，他将强烈呼吁北约成员国不要再为了释放人质而支付赎金。目前广泛认为法国和意大利已经为了释放人质付过赎金。

语调示意图：

 

重点单词发音讲解： 
alliance /ə'laiəns/
Islamic /iz'læmik/
ransom /ˈrænsəm/
hostage /hɔstidʒ/

模仿文本：

But 3-D companies are concerned about passing more restrictive copyright protection laws. They think these laws could place bans on the rights of citizens. They also believe restrictive copyright laws could suppress technological invention.而3D打印公司则在担忧政府会出台更具约束性的版权保护法，他们表示这样的法律不仅会局限公民的合法权益而且会阻碍技术研发。
